alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 08 at 7:14AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LIGHT FREEZING RAIN WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN CATTARAUGUS AND CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES... At 702 AM EDT, an area of very light rain is entering western and southern Chautauqua County. As this activity expands across the western Southern Tier this early morning, surface temperatures near or just below the freezing mark in spots could produce icy areas on bridges and overpasses. Temperatures are expected to rise back above freezing between 8 and 9 am. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Dunkirk, Fredonia, Allegany State Park, Westfield, Lakewood, Falconer, Mayville, Clymer, Long Point State Park, Jamestown West, SUNY Fredonia, Frewsburg, Chautauqua Institution, Lake Erie State Park, Findley Lake, Chautauqua, Busti, Portland and Sheridan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 17.
